name: Innocent VR
description: Judgement day comes. Due to severe damage caused by humans, natural disaster, unknown viruses, and mutated creatures have filled every corner of the world. In the face of catastrophe, you alone bear the responsibility of saving mankind.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions) Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD RX Vega 56 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions) Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD RX Vega 64 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
